decision_conditions: <p>Prior to occupation, a noise compliance test shall be carried out to confirm that the required noise levels have been met, and the results submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval. Internal Noise Criteria for New Residential Units (BS 8233:2014) within the proposed residential units (with the windows closed) the following internal noise levels shall be achieved;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><div dir="ltr" align="left" style="margin-left: 0pt;"><table style="border: none; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">30 dB LAeq, 8 hour</span></p></td></tr></tbody></table></div><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-f290a426-7fff-4213-c3e0-04984af0d21e"><br></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-f290a426-7fff-4213-c3e0-04984af0d21e">REASON: In the interests of safeguarding the adjacent night time economy and amenity of residential occupiers.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p>The development hereby permitted to be used as a dwellinghouse is to remain in use as a dwellinghouse within the meaning of Class C3 of Schedule 1 to the Use Classes Order and for no other purpose, except to the extent that the other purpose is ancillary to the use as a dwellinghouse.</p><p>REASON: To comply with the requirements of MA.2. (6)</p>

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
description: Prior Approval (Class MA) for a change of use from artist studio (Class E) to 2 x self contained units (Class C3).
